page.title: 03CHARLOTTE'S SATURDAYS CONT
page.content: We get our{Fish and Chips}from the mobile Fish and Chip van which comes twice a week.We have a mobile {Fish {and Chip Van}because we don't have any Fish and Chip shops in the village.The {Fish and Chip Van}parks outside the Youth Club.I spend about half an hour eating them. After lunch I sometimes go to{Ashridge {Woods.}We go and climb up the monument and look down on the people when we get to the top.After we have had a roam around we go home for our tea.We have sandwiches,cakes and a cup of tea.After tea we watch television. Some of the programmes we watch are{ {The A-Team,Hunter and Dynasty}.After we have watched several programmes we go to bed and read until about 10.30 p.m.
